column4: i tryed installing   xbmc-live  onto a   P4 2ghz   1gb ram   (GForce Fx5900)   and it fails  - due to a driver failure  thair site says that id need a t least a   GF 6600   - so  my question -  are there any alternatives to xbmc   that are equally good (nice)
you could try an older version perhaps.
I just use it, but if you're looking for xbmc-live support you should try #xbmc
